import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { form: any = { username: null, password: null } isLoggedIn = false isLoginFailed = false errorMessage = '' }
